backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (User, Post, Reaction, InviteCode) and all backend functions for user registration, post creation/editing, reactions, invite code management, and admin operations, with authorization mixins and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that cleans anonymous users from the users map and seeds default VEIL-001 through VEIL-005 invite codes on canister upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that frontend actor calls are gated behind non-anonymous Internet Identity authentication checks in useQueries.ts, referencing test REQ-126.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference for the project's frontend architecture and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, border, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell with a root div and module script entry point that bootstraps the Veil React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (login, signup, dashboard, create, posts, community, admin) wrapped in a QueryClientProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard component with four tabbed sections (Public Posts, Members, Invite Codes, Post History) and a back-navigation button to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AdminInviteCodes: Admin invite codes panel that lists unused and used codes, supports adding custom codes, generating random codes, revoking codes, and copying signup links to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublicPosts: Displays a paginated, sortable list of all public posts for admins, with the ability to delete individual posts via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserManagem: Admin panel component for listing all users in an accordion, allowing admins to suspend/unsuspend users and change their subscription status.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserPostHis: Admin tool that lets admins search for a user by principal ID and view or delete all of their posts.
frontend/src/components/EmotionBadge.tsx: Renders a styled badge pill for a given EmotionType (confess, broke, happy) with color-coded classes.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple site footer displaying the copyright year and a branded link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with logo, nav links (including conditional Admin link), user pseudonym display, and a sign-out button.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper layout component that composes Header, main content area, and Footer into a full-height flex column.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Card component for a single user post supporting inline editing, deletion, and toggling public/private visibility with subscription-gated publish access.
frontend/src/components/PublicPostCard.t: Renders a single public post card with emotion badge, content, creation date, and reaction buttons (support/care/strength), preventing owners from reacting to their own posts.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionBann: Displays an amber warning banner notifying the user their subscription has expired, showing region-specific renewal pricing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for the app, covering profile, admin, subscription, posts, reactions, and invite code operations against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, custom CSS variables for light/dark themes (colors, radius, emotion/status tokens), and reusable component classes like veil-card and emotion badges.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Protected admin page that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users, and renders the AdminDashboard component for verified admins.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityFeedPage.tsx: Protected page that fetches and displays all public posts sorted by newest first, redirecting unauthenticated or unregistered users.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page that greets authenticated users and lets them select an emotion (Confess, Broke, Happy) to create a post, with subscription expiry handling and redirects for unauthenticated or unregistered users.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that triggers Internet Identity authentication and redirects users to the dashboard or signup page based on whether they have an existing profile.
frontend/src/pages/MyPostsPage.tsx: Page displaying the authenticated user's posts sorted by creation date, with an empty state prompt to create a first post.
frontend/src/pages/PostCreationPage.tsx: Post creation form allowing authenticated users to select an emotion type and write content, enforcing subscription status and minimum word count requirements before submitting.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Registration page where authenticated users enter a pseudonym, region, and invite code to create a profile, with error mapping for backend validation failures.
frontend/src/utils/subscriptionHelpers.t: Utility functions for checking subscription status (active/grace/expired), determining post/public permissions, and returning region-based pricing strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routing, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/src/utils/wordCounter.ts: Provides word counting helpers and a 24-word minimum threshold, including a check for which emotion types require the minimum word count.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with custom fonts (Lora, Inter), OKLCH-based semantic color tokens (background, primary, emotion states, subscription statuses), border radius variables, and soft box shadows. Includes the tailwindcss-animate and @tailwindcss/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document (version 37) describing Veil's architecture, tech stack (React, Node.js/Express, MongoDB, JWT), DB schema, feature list, and known deployment issues including broken invite codes, admin initialization errors, and an invalid principal RTS error.
